articles.title: Rangers blow late two-goal lead in crushing overtime loss to Ducks - New York Post
articles.description: “Good teams do not lose a game like that,” Adam Fox said after the Rangers’ 5-4 overtime loss to the Ducks in which they blew a 4-2 lead.
